document_data.name: Fist of Faith
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fist of faith''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] that conjured a fist of invisible force energy.
document_data.Effects:
When this spell was cast, a [[priest]] created a forceful and invisible fist that struck unerringly at another person or creature. While it was not harmful to inanimate objects it was exceptionally damaging to the [[undead]].

Any being struck by a ''fist of faith'' was immune to further castings of the spell for a full day's time.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to be cast.
document_data.History: The title of this spell was inscribed within the ''[[Helm of Helm]]'' and could be cast by utterance of its wearer.
